description: This mysterious stone has a hypnotic effect. Legend holds it can be used as a random number generator, though the knowledge of how has been lost to modern history.
name: Abyssinia Deepvoid’s Stone of Mesmerization

description: Fight off the cold with the fire spell captured in this stone. Store away from flammable materials.
name: Horace Hellforge’s Neverwinter Stone

description: The warm light from this stone is restorative (literally). It’s been imbued with a greater restoration spell to cure seasonal depression.
name: Glynn Goldheart's Stone of Summer Warmth
